name: Modern Family (Season 9)
info:
• 中文名: 摩登家庭 第九季
  • 集数: 22
  • 开始: 2017-09-27
  • 类型: 喜剧
  • 国家/地区: 美国
  • 语言: 英语
  • Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Modern_Family_(season_9)

eps.name: Lake Life
eps.desc: Jay forces the family to take their vacation on a house boat on a lake; Mitchell runs into an old flame; Cam must avoid the sun; Phil and Claire try out some adventurous excursions; the kids' quest for a good time goes awry.

eps.name: The Long Goodbye
eps.desc: Phil and Claire realize that Alex may be more self-sufficient in college than they thought; Manny works to avoid a tearful goodbye after Gloria and Jay move him into his dorm; Hayley gets an unexpected opportunity.

eps.name: Catch of the Day
eps.desc: Phil's morning ritual makes him believe that he has an unlucky day coming. Mitch wants to find out why the kitchen rebuild contractor calls Cam "Boss", which makes him feel like the trophy wife. Jay copes with the absence of Manny at home as no one can back him up against Gloria.

eps.name: Sex, Lies and Kickball
eps.desc: Jay and Gloria bump into their old friend Shorty in the City and invite him to stay at their house. Pepper's and Ronaldo's adopted son Lionel has a sleepover with Lily, and Mitch and Cam questions whether Lionel's upbringing is the best for him. Alex takes a bold step to protest against Claire's bigotry on Ben.

eps.name: It's the Great Pumpkin, Phil Dunphy
eps.desc: The lack of shared enthusiasm in Halloween makes Phil and Claire wonder if they really are too old for the holiday. Over at the Pritchett's, Mitch and Cam are frustrated by how long Jay is taking to finish their kitchen remodel, which forces Mitch to finally stand up to his dad. Meanwhile, Gloria's hospitality is wearing thin when Cam oversteps his boundaries as a house guest.

eps.name: Ten Years Later
eps.desc: Claire organises a garden party for Jay & Gloria's 10th wedding anniversary. Gloria gets upset with preparing for Phil's magic trick for a reason she refuses to accept. Cam convinces Mitch to sing at the party, but the performance drives them to quarrels. Phil struggles to cope with the knowledge about his aspired magician career that could have been reality 15 years ago.

eps.name: Winner Winner Turkey Dinner
eps.desc: Jay celebrates the accomplishments of his children on a high profile during Thanksgiving dinner, but the backstories of Mitch's battle against an intruder and Claire's championship in a 10K run turn out much less than triumphant.

eps.name: Brushes with Celebrity
eps.desc: Each of the family members recalls their brushes with celebrities. Chris Martin shows up as Phil's client but Phil confronts with a medical emergency. Jay annoys Terry Bradshaw on jury duties to a critical point. Mitch and Cam are eager to be selected by a gardening show host, and Manny chats with a famous writer who shows no effort in hiding his displeasure meeting a fan.

eps.name: Tough Love
eps.desc: Phil decides to go in the woods alone for one week with the goal of proving his strong side, while Claire drives a truck for the very first time. Jay and Gloria are concerned about Manny's girlfriend, and the lessons Mitch attempts to teach Cam and Lily do not wind up as he thinks.

eps.name: No Small Feet
eps.desc: Alex and Luke start an online business with a rather peculiar target customer group. Claire lands an unprecedented opportunity for Pritchett's Closets & Blinds, but neither Claire nor Jay is content with each other's reaction. Gloria and Phil have troubles with a house Phil dreadfully tries to sell, and Bo Johnson, Pam's ex-lover and biological father of her son, shows up.

eps.name: He Said, She Shed
eps.desc: Luke and Phil attempt to conceal the truth behind Claire's request to build a "She Shed" in their backyard being denied by the homeowners association. Meanwhile, Cam reluctantly visits Mitch's therapist with his company to deal with the aftermath of Pameron disclosing a family secret.

eps.name: Dear Beloved Family
eps.desc: In this monumental 200th episode, Phil is hospitalised upon experiencing intense stomach pains and the whole family rush to his side for support. Claire goes on a hunt for the "Surgery Bear" to help Phil get through the surgery, while Phil's situation provokes Cam into escalating his jealousy on Mitch's crush, and Joe into contemplating the topic of death.

eps.name: In Your Head
eps.desc: Manny, Phil and Gloria search for Luke who has gone missing in a sketchy neighbourhood—as Manny perceives and Gloria remembers so. Haley interrupts Alex's college class to seek help for a job interview, and her professor Dr. Arvin Fennerman (Chris Geere) candidly addresses his thoughts to Haley. Jay tries to solve a riddle planted by his career nemesis, much to Claire's chagrin.

eps.name: Written in the Stars
eps.desc: With Gloria angry about the lack of concern on Jay's side over the Valentine's Day, Phil and Claire introduce him to their role playing escapade to spice up there romantic evening; they are thrown out Gloria is mistaken for a prostitute. Joe develops a crush on Claire, in which Claire does not reciprocate. Cam and Mitch are forced to have their dinner next to Luke who has been stood up. Meanwhile, Haley and Arvin have a night out in which the former finds the latter incompatible. Manny is concerned about not preparing a Valentine's card for his mother for the first time.

eps.name: Wine Weekend
eps.desc: Haley brings Manny and the adults to her boss' house for the Wine Weekend where nobody can touch the tiara. Jay and Claire struggle to keep Stella away from Gloria who attends a private party with Mitch. Elsewhere, Phil and Cam hide from their spouses their hip hop entertainment.

eps.name: Royal Visit
eps.desc: Haley brings her genius Astrophysicist boyfriend Dr. Arvin Fennerman to the Dunphy house for introducing him to Phil, Claire and Luke. Alex dates a good looking, dim witted but sensible Fire fighter Bill, whom she meets while he saves her from a small fire accident in her room. She is a bit mean to him as he is not smart. Phil and Claire try to outsmart each other to impress the Genius but some incident lead to a mishap in the house. Meanwhile Jay and Gloria get intimidated by Joe's friends parents whom Joe idolizes. Cam lies to Mitch and goes to the Royal Palace to watch the game and meets his favourite player. They talk with each other and end their misery at the end.

eps.name: Daddy Issues
eps.desc: Jay feels awkward when Jorge who happens to be Gloria's ex, shows up and has a strong resemblance with Manny. Luke and Joe help Phil to find the perfect gift for his aniversary with Claire. Lilly's puberty hits on Mitch and Cam.

eps.name: CHiPs and Salsa
eps.desc: When Haley hears that her loopy boss is looking for a product with the magical properties of peppers, she tries to gain favor by convincing Gloria to sell her salsa to NERP; Mitchell gets Cam the police ride-along he's always dreamed of. Also, Phil and Claire compete against one another while Luke has a meeting with a dean of university.

eps.name: Mother!
eps.desc: When Dede drops in unexpectedly, Mitchell and Cam come to a realization about her effect on their lives; Phil, Luke, Alex and Haley all have different bad news to break to Claire and compete about when to do it, the tiny window of time after her monthly spa day when she's her most relaxed

eps.name: The Escape
eps.desc: Haley meets Arvin’s parents but when things don’t go as planned, fate leads to an unexpected reunion with all of her ex-boyfriends. Meanwhile, the family seizes on a nursing home visit with Jay’s mean sister, Becky, to settle old scores. But as Jay, Claire and Mitchell compete for her time, Phil, Cam and Gloria end up getting trapped in the home’s basement with no way out.
